#text=I was n't happy with my previous haircut , so I wanted to try someplace new .
#text=I searched online for barbers and salons that were highly rated in the area .
#text=I finally decided on one that was fairly close by , highly reviewed , and had fair prices .
#text=I called the salon and made an appointment for the next day .
#text=Upon arriving , I was greeted by a very nice hair stylist .
#text=She had me sit in the chair and asked me how I wanted my hair cut .
#text=I told her exactly what I wanted and she understood completely .
#text=She went to work immediately , we made small talk .
#text=After she cut my hair , she washed it .
#text=After drying my hair , she added a little wax to style the hair .
#text=I was very happy with the haircut .
#text=I then paid and gave her a tip for her service .
